title: Wanted > T205 Ty Cobb PSA / SGC 1.5 to 3.5
author: DJR

posts.post_title: Wanted > T205 Ty Cobb PSA / SGC 1.5 to 3.5
posts.post_content: Hello, I'm looking to purchase a 2 or 3 copies in Good to VG range give or take and paying a premium for American Beauty. Both PSA and SGC okay but paying a little more for PSA. Please send a private message with images / pricing. Let's make a deal. Thanks, David
